page.title: 07Bisbrooke's Local Landlord
page.content:
Two twelve year old boys interviewed Mr. Peter D'Arcy, the landlord of "The Gate Inn" at Bisbrooke. This is what they found out:
Mr D'Arcy is about 50 years old, and has lived in the village for 15 years. He is married, and he and his wife live in a small cottage across the road from the pub. He has a blue Volvo Estate car, and reads the "Daily Express" and "Daily Mirror" newspapers. He goes shopping in Oakham and Uppingham, and goes to resorts on the south and east coasts for his holidays. The furthest he has ever travelled is to Jersey.
